tossup_question: -   –  What is the general name for enzymes that catalyse reactions that involve the transfer of a phosphate group from ATP?
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following is not a behavior generally associated with cancerous cells?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) They induce angiogenesis [an-gee-oh-gen-uh-sis]
X) They produce telomerase [tel-aw-mer-ayse]
Y) They cannot stop cell division
Z) They cannot proliferate when not adherent to substrate
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) THEY CANNOT PROLIFERATE WHEN NOT ADHERENT TO SUBSTRATE
